TopicTitle: Changing engine sounds with the new system.

Articles.Content:
So apparently the new SLS engines have a new Fx module and a lot of modders are using it for their engines. In the past ive always taken sounds from KW and Horizon Aeronautics ( Best sounding engines memory can buy ) and applied them to which ever engine I choose. The engage, the running and the flameout. It was really easy. I copied KW's method of a folder with the name of the part with my chosen sounds in it. Replaced the stock sounds in the .cfg. Easy.

The new module system.. still easy. I see the names of the sound I have to replace in the .cfg such as 


engage
  {
    AUDIO
    {
      channel = Ship
      clip = sound_vent_soft
      volume = 1.0
      pitch = 2.0
      loop = false
    }
  }

Replaced the sounds_vent_soft with the same name of the new sounds. Ogg files and mp3's. But sadly this doesn't work. What path is the module looking for? Can I change it?

AUDIO

{

channel = Ship

clip = KWRocketry/Parts/Engines/1mWildcat5/part/Sounds/sound_altloop

volume = 0.0 0.0

volume = 1.0 1.0

pitch = 0.0 0.2

pitch = 1.0 1.0

loop = true

}
Ah I see now. Thanks so much.
Sadly that didn't work Does the new system not work with .ogg files maybe?
Forgive me, but im going to bump this. I still have yet to figure this out.. is it possible? All attempts yield silence.
